News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League home fixture against Solihull Moors on Saturday
News.description:
The Daggers will be hoping to bounce back following a disappointing exit from the FA Trophy last weekend. They will also want to stop the rot as they are currently on a five match winless run at home in all competitions.

The Daggers opponents Solihull Moors currently sit in 16th in the Vanarama National League and will also be hoping to bounce back following their FA Trophy exit to Matlock.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 1-2 Worthing (Buildbase FA Trophy)
Dover 1-2 Daggers
Daggers 0-1 Torquay United
Daggers 1-4 Barrow
Maidstone 0-1 Daggers

Solihull Moors
Solihull 1-2 Matlock (Buildbase FA Trophy)
Luton 6-2 Solihull (Emirates FA Cup)
Southport 0-0 Solihull
Solihull 2-0 North Ferriby
Torquay 3-0 Solihull

Team News
The Daggers will be still be without a number of players for Saturday. Okenabirhie, Robson, Williams, Howell, Pennell, Ling and Robinson are all set to miss out. Guttridge may return to the team after not being involved in the FA Trophy squad

Previous Meetings
The two teams met for the first time in September with the Daggers running out 5-2 winners. An Oliver Hawkins hat-trick and goals from Okenabirhie and Maguire-Drew saw the Daggers comfortable winners.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website
